message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $20,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I've done some research and I think it's a bit overpriced at $20,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  However,  $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
